explains: v. 播送，传输，发射；传递，传达（思想、情感）；传播，传染（病毒、疾病等）；传导（声、电等），透（光等）

sentences.en: The speed with which digital cameras can take, process, and transmit an image is phenomenal.
sentences.cn: 数码相机拍摄、处理、传输图像的速度惊人。

sentences.en: This is currently the most efficient way to transmit certain types of data like electronic mail.
sentences.cn: 这是目前传输电子邮件等某类数据最有效的方法。
